name: The Pink Danger
description:
Version 0.3.3 Beta

Team Frost Shade

Short Description:

The Pink Danger 2 is a challenging little Plattformer.

Try to save the whole world with your pink colour!
Every world is unique and has it's own dangers.

Plot:

You are playing as the 19 years old Sally. One morning you wake up and realize that something is wrong. Every Person in your place is somehow dissapeared. You will have to find out the reason for that! Discover unknown worlds full of dangerous things and help Sally to find out more about herself through out the game.

Additional Information:

The Game is not finished yet! I really need feedback and ideas for upcoming levels. The Game supports Xbox360 Controller but still works better with a keyboard.

Updates:

Follow us on Twitter!

Thank you so much for reading and playing our game!

Thank you Laura for your awesome Artworks!

Have fun and send feedback! c:
